task_text: Sliders dialog creates duplicate slider rows for the same element/adjustable; add a duplicate check when adding sliders.
summary: Made Adjustable slider creation idempotent by deleting any existing slider row before creating a new one, and clearing UI references after deletion. This prevents duplicate slider rows when createSliders()/updateSliders() are invoked multiple times (imports/edits/UI refresh).

outcome.notes: Repeated slider rebuilds no longer duplicate UI rows; slider creation is safe to call multiple times.
